description: Maps the enum Behavior_Label_name from safetyproto to the corresponding behavior label type [Behavior_Label_name definition](https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/safetyproto/behavior_labels.proto)

schema.name: enum
schema.description: A key indicating the type of behavior label

schema.name: behavior_label_type
schema.description: The name of the behavior label (e.g., 'Speeding', 'HarshTurn', 'MobileUsage', 'ForwardCollisionWarning', etc.)
